text: is a train station on the Nankō Port Town Line (New Tram) in Suminoe-ku, Osaka, Japan. ==Lines== *Nankō Port Town Line (Station Number: P16) ==Layout== There is an elevated island platform with two tracks. The station is completely walled in with glass walls. ==Adjacent stations== Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1981 Category:Osaka Metro stations Category:Railway stations in Osaka Prefecture
title: Nankōguchi Station
